price: Ese ntiyari intanga mu masohoro asohowe?
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَكُ نُطۡفَةٗ مِّن مَّنِيّٖ يُمۡنَىٰ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: alam yaku nuṭ'fatan min maniyyin yum'nā
